metadata.title: CVE-2024-3859 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: On 32-bit versions there were integer-overflows that led to anout-of-bounds-read that potentially could be triggered by a malformedOpenType font. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125 and Firefox ESR <115.10.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
